scripts.version: npm version && git push && git push --tags
scripts.docker:build:amd64: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 --no-cache -t pelak:$npm_package_version-amd64 -t pelak:latest .
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:build:amd64 && npm run docker:build:arm64
scripts.docker:tag: docker tag pelak:latest m9020120014/pelak:latest && docker tag pelak:$npm_package_version-amd64 m9020120014/pelak:$npm_package_version-amd64 && docker tag pelak:$npm_package_version-arm64 m9020120014/pelak:$npm_package_version-arm64
scripts.docker:push: docker push m9020120014/pelak:latest && docker push m9020120014/pelak:$npm_package_version-amd64  && docker push m9020120014/pelak:$npm_package_version-arm64
scripts.docker:dockerhub: npm run docker:tag && npm run docker:push
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -a --volumes -f && docker image prune -f
